2.0.1.name: wordpress/secontactform
2.0.1.description:
SEContactForm (SMS Email Contact Form) comes with email SMTP and send mail capability. It is integrate with http://isms.com.my to provide SMS notification capability. SEContactForm is also able to integrate with iCRM.com.my to provide CRM database to save all inquiries. SEContactForm support CAPTCHA for spam filtering, it comes with predefined columns and user can choose to add in as many as 30 fields in a form. ISMS.com.my is able to send SMS worldwide with prepaid credit.

Plugin's Official Site

SEContactForm (SMS Email Contact Form) (http://isms.com.my/se_contact_form.php)
